worlds/menus/reeborg_intro_en.json.Hurdle 1:
def turn_right():
    turn_left()
    turn_left()
    turn_left() 

def walk_straight():
    move()
    turn_left()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_left()

path = 0
while( path < 6):
    walk_straight()
    path = path + 1
